revised_title: Anniversary Address by Prof. C. S. Sherrington
tldr: In his anniversary address, Prof. C. S. Sherrington honors the memory of the Fellows and Foreign Members of the Royal Society who passed away since the last anniversary meeting. He also highlights their significant contributions to various fields of science, including physics, chemistry, and biology. The address pays tribute to their dedication to research and education, and their impact on the scientific community.
